information on all YPO programs service and news Directions on how to use the Web links Hold your mouse pointer over the link and left click on your mouse opening your Web browser directly to that link If it does not connect you open your Web browser and copypaste the link to the browser Remember to have your YPO User ID and password ready If you do not have this information or have
